titleStmt.title: Of religious communion private, & publique With the silenceing of the clamours raysed by Mr Thomas Helvvisse agaynst our reteyning the baptism receaved in Engl: & administering of Bapt: vnto infants. As also a survey of the confession of fayth published in certayn conclusions by the remaynders of Mr Smithes company. ... By Iohn Robinson.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, John, 1575?-1625.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by STC.
